name: Retrieve social media records from Airtable, add it to Buffer and send Slack notifications
description: When you add social media posts to Airtable as records, the posts are automatically retrieved and added to your Buffer queue, the records are then updated in Airtable and Slack notifications are sent. This template uses this [Airtable template.](https://airtable.com/shrPSqQlflHpWbIBe/tblK3DlV5iFTjnxvv/viwGnQ31bYWPhPLas?blocks=hide)
